metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13566 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the ROS communications-related packages (akaros_comm or ros-melodic-ros-comm) through 1.14.3. A buffer overflow allowsattackers to cause a denial of service and possibly execute arbitrary codevia an IP address with a long hostname.

criterions.comment: ros-ros-comm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
